law.catch_line: To further more equitable establishment and adjustment of rates and premiums and forms of contracts,...
law.text:
To further more equitable establishment and adjustment of rates and premiums and forms of contracts, policies, or guarantees of insurance, the Commissioner and each title insurer may:
exchange information and experience data with each other, with insurance supervisory officials and insurers in other states, and with national organizations and associations; and
consult and cooperate with them about rate and premium making and forms of contracts, policies, and guarantees of insurance.
